item.description:
EVENT: Join this annual tradition, sponsored by MIT Hillel, in which the best and brightest
of MIT professors earnestly debate the superiority of the latke and the hamentaschen. Decide
for yourself, sampling both after the debate. This event is a hoot and is always standing room
only! RSVP so we can save seats and sit together. See the MIT web site for more information
: http://www.mit.edu/~h...

TC: Anne catwoman@mosaicmass.org or (day of event) 617-571-7081
RSVP: Recommended by February 23 to Anne at the address above. Otherwise, you’re on your own!
MEET: 7:30 p.m. in MIT 26-100. (That’s Building 26, Room 100.) If you are not familiar with the MIT
campus, check here for a map: http://whereis.mit.ed...
COST: Event is free + $5 for non-members.

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: LATKE AND HAMENTASCHEN DEBATE
